name: ts1-sensor-programmer
description: TS1 Sensor Programmer - Automated ESP8266 Programming Interface

scripts.pi-setup: echo 'Setting up for Raspberry Pi...' && npm install && cp config.example.json config.json && echo 'Configuration copied. Please edit config.json with your settings.'
scripts.pi-service: echo 'Creating systemd service...' && sudo systemctl enable ts1-programmer && sudo systemctl start ts1-programmer && echo 'Service enabled and started!'
